ModLink.Name: ModCommon
ModLink.Description: Library used by many mods.

ModLink.Name: ModConsole
ModLink.Description: An in-game REPL which allows you to easily run C#

ModLink.Name: Hell Mod
ModLink.Description: Various nerfs to the player (nail, spells, damage, SOUL, etc.) and several buffs to enemies/bosses (health and damage)

ModLink.Name: Bingo UI
ModLink.Description: Automatic tracking of bingo goals for randomizer or vanilla bingo speedrun races

ModLink.Name: Dumbmod
ModLink.Description: Makes most animated things invisible

ModLink.Name: HollowPoint (SEE README)
ModLink.Description: Gives the player a gun, reworks charms and abilities to play around the concept of gun usage

ModLink.Name: Bindings
ModLink.Description: Applies the bindings from the Godhome Pantheons to the main game. Intended for practicing for bound pantheons in the Hall of Gods

ModLink.Name: Lost Lord
ModLink.Description: Significant buff to Lost Kin

ModLink.Name: Pale Prince
ModLink.Description: Significant buff for Pure Vessel with new moves

ModLink.Name: Random Pantheons
ModLink.Description: Randomizes Godhome’s Pantheons. Bosses appear in random order.

ModLink.Name: Mantis Gods
ModLink.Description: Significantly buffs Mantis Lords

ModLink.Name: WeaverCore
ModLink.Description: Library used by Inferno King Grimm

ModLink.Name: Inferno King Grimm
ModLink.Description: Significantly buffs Nightmare King Grimm

ModLink.Name: Corrupted Kin
ModLink.Description: Turns Lost Kin into a two phase boss fight and makes it harder.

ModLink.Name: Sanic
ModLink.Description: Allows for modification of game speed for going fast

ModLink.Name: RNG
ModLink.Description: Randomizes animation speeds, waits, and velocities (not recommended for serious use)

ModLink.Name: CharmOverhaul
ModLink.Description: Rebalances charms to make them stronger

ModLink.Name: Chaos Mode
ModLink.Description: Adds a variety of random effects which swap every few seconds

ModLink.Name: RandoMapMod
ModLink.Description: Mod which shows randomizer items on the map.

ModLink.Name: Lightbringer
ModLink.Description: Changes nail attack to a lance of light, reworks charms, many other changes

ModLink.Name: MoreSaves
ModLink.Description: Allows for more than 4 save slots, organized into multiple pages in the save menu

ModLink.Name: The Pain of the Path
ModLink.Description: Allows the player to complete the Path of Pain backwards, starting just above the final drop to the Kingsmoulds

ModLink.Name: QoL
ModLink.Description: Slight improvements to gameplay (skippable cutscenes/credits, “unfixed” menu drop and storage, etc.)

ModLink.Name: ASCII Camera
ModLink.Description: Replaces the camera with an ASCII overlay of it

ModLink.Name: Hollow Twitch
ModLink.Description: Configures twitch chat to handle several commands that spice up gameplay

ModLink.Name: Blackmoth
ModLink.Description: Changes main mode of attack from nail to shade dash, some charms changed to affect dash

ModLink.Name: Debug Mod
ModLink.Description: Allows for debug tools and features like no clip, invincibility, removing and giving items and abilities

ModLink.Name: SereCore
ModLink.Description: Library used mostly by the Randomizer mods

ModLink.Name: Vasi
ModLink.Description: Library required for some mods to function

ModLink.Name: Randomizer 2 (Old)
ModLink.Description: Mixes up charms, spells, abilities, etc. for new saves, difficulty settings and randomization seeds included

ModLink.Name: Custom Knight
ModLink.Description: Allows for the player character’s sprites to be edited by modifying image files in the Hollow Knight directory

ModLink.Name: Show Hitboxes
ModLink.Description: Displays Hitboxes

ModLink.Name: Enemy Randomizer
ModLink.Description: Randomizes enemy spawns (with some limitations), several randomization modes (may break)

ModLink.Name: Bonfire Mod
ModLink.Description: Adds upgradeable stat bonuses to the game (purchased with geo)

ModLink.Name: Glorious Combos
ModLink.Description: Nerfs player damage, but gradually increases it as the player chains attacks, rewarding skill in combat with increased DPS. Recommended for use in Godhome only, but settings allow it to be used in Hallownest proper

ModLink.Name: Infinite Grimm
ModLink.Description: Includes multiple modes like Time Attack and One Hit, Nightmare God Grimm is packaged with this, (takes place in Dirtmouth, not Godhome)

ModLink.Name: Grimmchild Upgrades
ModLink.Description: Buffs/modifies level 4 Grimmchild, and makes it fully customizable

ModLink.Name: Unofficial Hollow Knight Patch
ModLink.Description: Fixes Absrad hazard spawn bug, sharp shadow fix, and adds new PV statue in Hall of Gods

ModLink.Name: Redwing
ModLink.Description: Gives the player several new fiery attacks and abilities making them stronger. Fully configurable with optional "hard" mode

ModLink.Name: Redwing Assets
ModLink.Description: Video assets for the Redwing mod.

ModLink.Name: 'Art' Mods
ModLink.Description: Shitpost mod

ModLink.Name: Infinite Notches
ModLink.Description: Gives the player infinite notches, might mess with save

ModLink.Name: Player Data Tracker
ModLink.Description: Tracks player data. Most frequently used to display abilities/charms during Randomizer streams

ModLink.Name: Charm Notch Mod
ModLink.Description: Automatically grants notches normally bought from Salubra upon collecting the required number of charms

ModLink.Name: EnemyHPBar
ModLink.Description: Displays customizable health bars above enemies and big health bar for bosses

ModLink.Name: Fragile Strength for Nail Arts
ModLink.Description: Fragile/Unbreakable Strength increases the damage of Nail Arts

ModLink.Name: Ultimatum Radiance
ModLink.Description: Significantly buffs Absolute Radiance

ModLink.Name: Darkness
ModLink.Description: Renders the Lumafly Lantern useless and makes every room dark (akin to Deepnest without the lantern)

ModLink.Name: Daughter of Hallownest
ModLink.Description: Modifies Hornet Sentinel to a 3-phase boss, focused on projectile attacks from other bosses.

ModLink.Name: Benchwarp
ModLink.Description: Allows warping to benches, has an option to display room names, required for Randomizer 2 and 3

ModLink.Name: Pale Champion
ModLink.Description: Significant rework to Pale Lurker

ModLink.Name: Elderbug God
ModLink.Description: monkaU

ModLink.Name: Randomizer 3 (Item or Room)
ModLink.Description: Mixes up charms, spells, abilities, etc. for new saves, difficulty settings and randomization seeds included. Includes a room and area rando mode.

ModLink.Name: Crystalblobbles
ModLink.Description: Oblobbles but with Crystal Hunter crystals

ModLink.Name: Traitor God
ModLink.Description: Singificant buff to Traitor Lord

ModLink.Name: Tribe of Battle
ModLink.Description: Mantis Lords and Traitor Lord simultaneously

ModLink.Name: LoadNormalizer
ModLink.Description: Normalizes loads across computers, used for races.

ModLink.Name: Path of Pure Vessel
ModLink.Description: Adds pure vessel at the end of Path of Pain

ModLink.Name: Press G to Dab
ModLink.Description: Press G to dab.

ModLink.Name: Royal Dreamer
ModLink.Description: markoth buff cold_face

ModLink.Name: Dream Shield Coop
ModLink.Description: Adds a controllable Dreamshield alongside the player character

ModLink.Name: Transtrans
ModLink.Description: TikTiks support trans rights

ModLink.Name: Lifeblood Master
ModLink.Description: Significantly buffs Hive Knight.

ModLink.Name: DeathCounter
ModLink.Description: Counts your deaths with a slot in the inventory

ModLink.Name: Indie Crossover
ModLink.Description: Integrates Propeller Knight, Fennel, and Cagney Carnation into the game as a boss fight

ModLink.Name: EasyMode
ModLink.Description: Adds a variety of assisting effects that is meant to help newer or struggling players.

ModLink.Name: Uuwuu
ModLink.Description: Significantly buffs Uumuu

ModLink.Name: ItemChanger
ModLink.Description: A library which performs many of the same tasks as Randomizer such as modifying and creating items

ModLink.Name: plandoplando
ModLink.Description: Reads from an XML file to change item locations and add preloaded objects.

ModLink.Name: Exaltation
ModLink.Description: Overhauls charms, implementing unused “charm glorification” concept teased prior to Godmaster. Charms are buffed by completing Pantheons in Godhome, making them much stronger.

ModLink.Name: PaletteSwapper
ModLink.Description: Randomizes the color tints of rooms for each area. Configurable.

ModLink.Name: NG+ (King's Pass)
ModLink.Description: Make's King's pass significantly more difficult by adding platforming challenges while disabling pogos.

ModLink.Name: SFCore
ModLink.Description: Library required for some mods to function

ModLink.Name: BlindRadiance
ModLink.Description: Mod to darken selected scenes for visibility

ModLink.Name: Language Support
ModLink.Description: Adds support for additional languages in a CustomKnight style

ModLink.Name: AdditionalMaps
ModLink.Description: A mod that adds maps for the White Palace and Godhome.

ModLink.Name: Test of Teamwork
ModLink.Description: This mod adds a platforming section to the White Palace.

ModLink.Name: Child of Light
ModLink.Description: Replaces your spells with Radiance attacks.

ModLink.Name: Howwow Knyight
ModLink.Description: Twanswates aww of de text in Howwow Knyight into de much supewiow UwU wanguage, incwuding menyus, usew intewface and in-game diawogues! >w<

ModLink.Name: FrogCore
ModLink.Description: Library mod containing stuff for adding journal entries and npcs

ModLink.Name: Lunatic Radiance
ModLink.Description: Bullet Hell Radiance Boss in Hollow Knight

ModLink.Name: Grassy Knight
ModLink.Description: Tracks and shows you how much grass you've cut.

ModLink.Name: Buzzbo
ModLink.Description: A mod that significantly buffs Hive Knight

ModLink.Name: Easier Pantheon Practice
ModLink.Description: A mod that makes practicing in HoG easier. It adds many features some of them include, allowing you to press a key to reload bosses much quicker, matcheing the health and damage of bosses with P5, and giving you the ability to do fury practice in HoG. There are more but you can read the readme for that :)

ModLink.Name: Controller Vibration
ModLink.Description: Adds in controller vibration through any XInput device (Xbox controllers).

ModLink.Name: ToggleableBindings
ModLink.Description: A mod that allows you to enable and disable bindings at any time.

ModLink.Name: HollowKnightDRPC
ModLink.Description: A mod that adds Discord RPC (detailed game) status to your Discord profile.

ModLink.Name: SmolKnight
ModLink.Description: A mod that makes the knight smol.

ModLink.Name: Hkmote
ModLink.Description: A mod that allows players to send emotes on HKMP during Multiplayer.

ModLink.Name: BeansDefender
ModLink.Description: Just a meme
